Title: Mogu Runes of Fate
Description: Greetings, $n. I am privileged to offer you an excellent opportunity. Through the centuries, we've honed a method by which the very laws of chance themselves can be bent. With a Mogu Rune of Fate, valuable artifacts will find their way into your hands more frequently inside the palace of the Thunder King.
ObjectivesText: Collect 50 Lesser Charms of Good Fortune.

Objectives.Text: Collect: Lesser Charm of Good Fortune
